name: Remi/Flan Rush
description:
The downloadable versions are highly recommended! They have no jittery backgrounds!

Description

Remilia and Flandre got into a fight for a cake, and in the chaos, they were knocked flying! Who will be the first to get back to the Scarlet Devil Mansion and have the cake all to herself? Find out in this frantic sidescrolling shooter game!

Entry to Touhou Game Jam 2022.

Controls 

[Player 1]

- WASD: Move

- Left Shift: Focus

- I: Shoot

- O: Melee

- P: Fever Attack

- Esc: Pause

[Player 2]

- Arrow Keys: Move

- Right Shift: Focus

- Numpad 7: Shoot

- Numpad 8: Melee

- Numpad 9: Fever Attack

- Numpad -: Pause

Mechanics

You can probably figure out all the mechanics by trial and error, but here's a full explanation:

  • Fever (orange meter): You gain fever when you take damage or deal damage, but the amount does not matter. Fever can be used to throw bullets at your opponent to slow them down (Fever Attack). The more fever you have, the stronger the attack is, but once used, your fever is reset.
    • To be precise, for both Flandre and Remilia, there are four Fever Attack patterns. The strongest pattern appears at 100% fever.
  • Health (green meter): As the Scarlet Sisters are vampires, they will take damage  gradually outside shade. Hide under clouds to heal slowly. Being around Cirno heals you faster.
  • Umbrella (Meiling): When Meiling is with you, you will regenerate health very quickly, but she will leave once you get hit.
